summary: Frontend testing PASSED - All key features verified: Dashboard login, 3-panel layout, Yagi Array toggle with config panel, SWR improvement (1.3->1.0), and all 10 dropdowns clickable on full trigger area
passed_tests: Dashboard loads correctly after login with admin credentials - PASS
3-panel layout verified: Equipment Rack (left), Canvas (center), Controls (right), Metrics (bottom) - PASS
Yagi Array Mode toggle works - changes state from unchecked to checked - PASS
Yagi configuration panel shows when toggle is ON with 5-ELEMENT YAGI ARRAY label - PASS
Yagi stick type dropdown shows options: 8' Fighting Sticks (+5.5dBi) and 10' Fighting Sticks (+7dBi) - PASS
ANT1, ANT2, DIR1 element height sliders visible and functional - PASS
Canvas shows Yagi Array visualization with 5 antenna elements - PASS
SWR changes from 1.3 to 1.0 when Yagi mode is toggled ON - PASS
Vehicle dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Antenna Position dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Radio dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Driver Amplifier dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Final Amplifier dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Antenna dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Alternator Count dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Alternator Amps dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Battery Type dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
Battery Count dropdown clickable on full trigger area - PASS
MetricsPanel shows valid values: SWR=1.3, Amp Volts=14.2, Take-Off=22, Amp Temp=25° (no NaN/undefined) - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard 3-panel layout using CSS Grid (grid-cols-12) is correctly implemented
Yagi toggle uses Switch component with data-state attribute for proper state management
SWR calculation for Yagi mode (calculateYagiSWR) returns 1.0 vs regular mode (calculateSWR) returning 1.3
Select components use Radix UI SelectPrimitive with cursor-pointer class for full trigger clickability
Canvas renders Yagi Array visualization when config.yagiMode is true using drawYagiArray function
context_for_next_testing_agent: All key features working: 1) Yagi Array toggle shows/hides config panel with stick type dropdown and element height sliders, 2) SWR improves from 1.3 to 1.0 when Yagi is enabled, 3) All 10 dropdowns (Vehicle, Antenna Position, Radio, Driver Amp, Final Amp, Antenna, Alt Count, Alt Amps, Battery Type, Battery Count) open correctly when clicking on full trigger area, not just arrow, 4) MetricsPanel shows valid values for all 6 metrics, 5) 3-panel layout renders correctly on desktop view
